entry.title: vgbr-dev/slim-transport: Lightweight, extensible logging library with Clean Architecture. Supports console, file, and custom transports with modular formatting. Perfect for vanilla JS and Node.js applications.

entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
entry.content: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

entry.title: imabhi7/Local-Certificate-Authority-Service: Open-source web app for managing CSRs and issuing X.509 certificates in a small PKI. Built with Node.js, React, and PostgreSQL, it offers user/admin dashboards, secure authentication, and email notifications. Perfect for lightweight PKI setups.
entry.content: Open-source web app for managing CSRs and issuing X.509 certificates in a small PKI. Built with Node.js, React, and PostgreSQL, it offers user/admin dashboards, secure authentication, and email notifications. Perfect for lightweight PKI setups.
